To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private FractalAdaptiveMovingAverage _frama;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_frama = FRAMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_frama.IsReady)
{
    var current = _frama.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.frama = self.FRAMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.frama.IsReady:
    current = self.frama.Current.Value
